text: Providenciales is the main tourist island in the Turks and Caicos Islands. It is also where most of the people in the country live, with a population of about 32,000.Provo population in 2012, World gazetteer, download Apr 1, 2012 The island has an area of . Grace Bay is where most of the resorts are. The first resort was Club Med. It opened in 1984.About Providenciales - Visit Turks and Caicos Islands, download Feb 2, 2012 Blue Hills, Five Cays, and The Bight were the original villages. ==References== ==Other websites== * Providenciales - Visit Turks and Caicos Islands Category:Geography of the Turks and Caicos Islands Category:Caribbean islands
title: Providenciales
